title: Ensigo
description: Millions of trees are planted every year across Africa â€” yet too few survive. Ensigo Africa is fixing that by building a tech-driven native seed network that ensures every tree planted is traceable, viable, and ecologically appropriate.

title: MTN Smart Rural Hubs
